scripts.copy-assets: npm run copy-js && npm run copy-css && npm run copy-fonts
scripts.copy-js: mkdir -p public/assets/js && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js public/assets/js/jquery.min.js && cp node_modules/datatables.net/js/dataTables.min.js public/assets/js/dataTables.min.js && cp  node_modules/d3/dist/d3.min.js public/assets/js/d3.min.js && cp ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js public/assets/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js && cp ./node_modules/datatables.net-bs5/js/dataTables.bootstrap5.min.js public/assets/js/dataTables.bootstrap5.min.js
scripts.copy-css: mkdir -p public/assets/css && cp node_modules/datatables.net-bs5/css/dataTables.bootstrap5.min.css public/assets/css/dataTables.bootstrap5.min.css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css public/assets/css/bootstrap.min.css && cp node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.min.css public/assets/css/bootstrap-icons.min.css && cp ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css.map public/assets/css/bootstrap.min.css.map
